MAIN_MESSAGE: This is a message for customers in the FK11 postcode area of Menstrie. It is necessary for our engineers to carry out an emergency shutdown at 3pm to Repair a faulty pillar outside number 3 School Mews and this may affect the supply to your property. We will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 6pm. We will update this message if this information changes We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 1:47PM on Sunday 10 January 2021.
